paramobject.name: ProcessGroups
paramobject.description: List of Process Groups under the Sub System Definition

paramobject.name: ProcessGroup
paramobject.description: A Process Group Definition. This is the Middle level in the Process hierarchy.

paramobject.name: ProcessSectionRef
paramobject.description: Reference of the Process Section being executed for this group

paramobject.name: Enabled
paramobject.description: Enables or Disables the Process Group
